document.discussion_title: Titanic sinking simulation a real-time hit online
document.topic_text: It's not your typical viral video, but a real-time simulation of the Titanic sinking has millions of views on YouTube since it was uploaded on April 14. The video runs a remarkable two hours and 41 minutes. And it's actually a teaser for an immersive video game currently in production called Titanic: Honor and Glory , which will let players experience what it was like to be on the ill-fated ship when it went down.
